bugs.summary: [css-mediaqueries] make context-dependent color scheme propagation works in iframes (even cross-origin iframes)
Intermittent TV dom/html/test/test_bug1785739.html | undefined assertion name - got 1, expected 115
Enable all ESLint rules on dom production files
Some mochitests attempt to set `gfx.font_loader.delay` themselves, but that's unnecessary and not-allowed since it's a "mirror:once" pref
Various test code sets "gfx.font_loader.interval" but it seems to be never used
Implement logic for setting/removing last remembered size
Can't add a new search engine from search bar when only one search engine exists
Start using private fields in MessageHandler
